= Project Notes =

== Project Technologies ==
 * Primary language: Java
 * Build: Maven
 * Source code management: SVN
 * Packaging: WAR (.war file)
 * Database: PostgreSQL
 * XML specification: XML Schema (.xsd documents)
 * XML-object mapping: JAXB
 * Server: Tomcat
 * Application architecture: RESTlets under controlling servlet
 * ORM: JPA/Hibernate

== Database Tables ==

=== Central Database ===
 * Project
 * Hub
 * SpacialObject
 * HubService
 * CoordinateTransformation
 * Process
 * ProcessParameter
 * Spaces tables
   * Author
   * Orientation
   * SRS
   * Slice
   * Fiducial
   * Structure

=== Hub Databases ===
Same as Central except no Hub table
